attributes.action: To lower the price of school uniform
attributes.additional_details: We want people of all ages to access a good education and if this is being stopped by expensive uniform costs then it is unfair. Do you agree? Some parents struggle to get necessities in order to live, for example: food, water and shelter. This can be challenging for the parents as they do not need expensive uniform to get in the way of their already struggling financial problems. It can also have a negative effect on the child as it can stop their education and have a profound impact in their lives.
attributes.background: We would like the Government to change uniform prices. Many parents and students struggle to afford the expensive prices of uniform.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

The cost of school uniforms is a matter for retailers, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Ban school uniforms in English schools: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607158

Require schools to make uniform optional: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608259
